website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding lumbar support pillow that is both soft and durable.
pros: Matches the back's alignment perfectly to help you address back stiffness and soreness
Cotton cover is simple to remove and machine-washable
Backed by a 100 percent satisfaction guarantee
cons: Cushion tends to flatten over time

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly with my office chair
customer_reviews.text: I have a Merax brand office chair and it’s amazing! The only downside is that there’s a small gap in the lower back region making it hard to sit up straight. I would usually go for the bigger cushions but only needed something that would fill in that small gap and it did just that. The pillow is very soft and doesn’t sink too easily but then again I’m a pretty light person (I weight around 140 lbs). If you need something large with extra support and more back coverage, I’d look elsewhere, but if you want something that’ll fill in any lower back gaps on your chair without any added bulk, then this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: HandsON

customer_reviews.title: What I liked the most is that it’s small
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most is that it’s small, fits the lower back in just the right area. Tried several other pillows that just didn’t fit right. The memory foam is suppr comfortable and you’d don’t realize it’s there after awhile. I ordered two one for my wife and she loves hers also. She has major back problems and it’s helping a lot on our theatre seats that she wouldn’t even sit in because of no lower back support. Great product would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ristagno

customer_reviews.title: Great for low back pain
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I just had a disc injury in my lower back and this pillow has allowed me to drive my car without the extra pain that comes from sitting. It has just the right amount of support. I would recommend the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Comfort!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this pillow! It is very well made and although it feels soft to the touch, it provides just the right amount of support for the lumbar section. I have a La-z-Boy recliner (the Maverick). It’s one of those mechanical types that has lumbar support, but for some reason it seems too high up the back when I recline. This pillow fills that gap between the seat bottom and the lumbar support built into the chair. It is perfect! It was delivered fast and well packaged. Give it a try. You definitely won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Great for car
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Relax Support lumbar pillow. It is perfect for the car as it provides just enough lumbar support without being too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: The Sometimes Savvy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful my backache was gone by noon :)
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing!!! I had it within 48 hrs much to my surprise. I have fibromyalgia & my back always hurts, Used it at work today & my back was hurting when I got to work & by noon the pain was gone for thefirsttime in weeks. Recommending it to my coworker. Other reviews said it was more expensive than other products but I found it comparable & I looked at them all. It also fits snuggly in my back & it's smaller than the rest which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: So good for my back that I ordered a second one! This is the perfect back pillow for me. It gives me unparalleled relief from back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and value for the cost. I posted a review previously, but I see that it was deleted. Is someone getting money under the table to only accept good reviews? Pls accept my review; otherwise, I will call corporate and report the discrepancy. With that said, this item isn’t sturdy enough to support anything (unless you are a child). Save the $30 and go buy something—anything—supportive, and it will do a better job than this one IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Will&PA

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: It is made up of very soft foam and becomes flat on gentle pressure. A support should retain its shape to provide any back support. Will be returning it. Amazon service on the other hand is always top notch.
customer_reviews.author: puebloan

customer_reviews.title: Finally a lumbar pillow that actually supports!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as I opened the box. I’ve been through so many that were way to soft to actually support your lower back. This does the trick. Even though it’s smallish it hits my back just right and does not collapse after you’re on it for a while. Thanks for a product that does what it’s supposed to do. Happy girl!
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: small but nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow. I've only had it a couple of days but it's a nice size and nice pillow thus far. It is a low profile but provides serious support. I sure hope it lasts and if it does I want to buy another one for my car! This pillow is perfect for my soft backed recliner. I really like so far and researched a lot of them. I didn't want something bulky and large. This is just what I wanted, hope it lasts! It's comfy too!!
customer_reviews.author: A. McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Just right for MY size
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5’5” female, 150 pounds. I had back surgery (L4-S1) a few years ago. I needed something to provide mainly lower back support in my aging recliner. This cushion is very soft, medium level of support, and fits me just right. Because of its small size, it’s just what I was looking for, not the larger “full back” lumbar support cushion. I doubt this would work as well for anyone very much larger than I am, nor for anyone looking for something more than LOWER back support. I’ve only been using for 10 days; so far the cushion is resilient. If it doesn’t prove to be durable, I will submit an addendum.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW! I mean really - wow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is fantastic! I had a small inflatable one before this and it was okay but nowhere near as good as this one! This pillow fits perfectly into my recliner, like it was meant to be part of it. I have an Ashley reclining theater chair but it just doesn't have great lumbar support. This pillow feels the gap at the lower back atea perfectly. It stays exactly in place and not push my back out or feel obstructive. I just cannot say how perfectly it fits in that space like it was meant to be! It is absolutely fantastic and actually made me say wow! I'm going to get another one for my wife!
customer_reviews.author: R. Mumma

customer_reviews.title: This lumbar support pillow works wonders in a recliner that has no lumbar support.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old recliner, which has no lumbar support. I was not in a position to be able to go out and buy a new recliner. I ordered this lumbar support pillow, even though it said it was for driving or perhaps an office chair, but I am using it in my old recliner and from the 1st hour that I used it, I have no more pain in my back while sitting in my chair. This certainly was a cheaper alternative send buying a new chair. I would recommend this lumbar support pillow to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered the Relax Support Pillow RS1 and have been enjoying it so much on my leather recliner that I bought another one for my car. The memory foam is tough and conforms well to my lower back. The pillow fills that "space" that often shows up in the lumbar region when a reclining chair reclines. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for elderly mother
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mother who has bad lower back issues. She claims it made her back hurt worse as it doesn't hit her back in the right spot. However, she's a fuss pot, so it could work nicely for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: CGaudreau

customer_reviews.title: HEAVENLY Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: HEAVENLY!! This has helped fill the gap between my recliner & my lower back. Have also used in the car with good results. It”s soft yet sturdy enough to hold shape and not go flat after sitting for a while. Have only used for a very brief time so will update review if any changes needed. And a bonus!! No smell when I took it out of the plastic sleeve. It was nicely packaged for shipping and Amazon had it delivered quickly. Please check yes if this review was helpful. Recommend highly!😊
customer_reviews.author: MickeylynTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent between model colours
customer_reviews.text: I originally loved this. I bought a grey one for my desk chair at work and it worked well but the beige one i just received is more expensive and of subpar quality. The strap material and fastener are of a different material and nearly impossible to adjust. The hook and loop you use to attach it to your chair keeps getting stuck as you try to remove it. I know i need it for my home office so I guess I'll keep it and figure out a way to adjust but i'm incredibly frustrated and disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Attractive support pillow that keeps its shape
customer_reviews.text: After using decorative lumbar pillows that soon turn into flattened bricks, I found the Relax Support pillow RS1 and love it! The size, shape, and appearance are perfect for my chair. Nothing ugly here! I don’t even mind the unobtrusive Relax Support logo. The pillow may be adjusted up or down until you locate the specific area where the extra support is needed. Then, each time you sit in the chair, it is easy to place the pillow in that spot. Also, the Relax Support pillow is made of memory foam, so it keeps its shape and doesn’t turn into a flattened brick! Try it! Mine had free returns, but it’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: ICrawford

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and shape for my back
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason I have not been able to feel comfortable sitting in most chair recently and my back hurts. I get headaches. It felt like my back was slouching and didn't have enough support, so I went looking for a solution. First I tried using bed pillows, then I tried couch pillows, then I tried chunks of memory foam. Nothing quite felt right. Most pillows were too big. This pillow is just the right size and has the perfect shape. My back pain has subsided and I'm very happy with this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: FaceLord

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This lumbar support pillow is a perfect size and shape for use in a variety of circumstances. It's provides firm lumbar support, and is small enough to be mobile and adaptable for use in different types of chairs, car seats, etc. The company seems genuinely interested in their customer's satisfaction and experience in using their product as well. I plan to give this as a gift to a couple of my friends with lower back issues.
customer_reviews.author: S. Suncin

customer_reviews.title: Relieves Stiff Back
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these - one for my husband and 1 for myself. We use them when sitting in a reclining love seat for extra back support. It has made a world of difference in our comfort level. We both used to have stiff backs when going from sitting to standing. Since we’ve been using these little support pillows neither of us had that problem. It seemed like a lot of money for such a little cushion, but it turns out they are well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: CAJ

customer_reviews.title: I forget I use this sometimes
customer_reviews.text: It's always in my seat, I forget that it's there sometimes, because of how seamless it is used. It never leaves my driver's seat, and it's almost like it's part of it because I forget it's there. I used to get bad back pain driving, but this helps so much with comfort, and lumbar support. I don't use the straps because it doesn't really wrap around well, but I havn't needed to use it. I prefer this over a raised cushion, because those cushions can get warm / uncomfortable / shift around. This one is small and compact and does an amazing job. It does get stiff in cold weather, but it's not really an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ho

customer_reviews.title: This really is the most comfortable lower back support pillow I have ever used or ...
customer_reviews.text: This really is the most comfortable lower back support pillow I have ever used or ever seen. The cushion is so soft and conforms to my back in just the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Stark

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended a pillow for me for use in my car. I've been having sciatica type pains in my leg caused by my SI joint. It's hard to say if this product has helped because my pain comes and goes and is off and on. But, I haven't had any pains since I started using it, so perhaps it's helped. It did take me quite a while to get used to the pillow. There's been a lot of seat adjustments since I got it, but I think I finally found the perfect spot where i'm comfortable. All in all it seems to be made very well and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Giggy

customer_reviews.title: Good Pillow for  My Short Torso
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office chair and feels really good on my back and helps me keep good posture. I have lower back pain and while this doesn't eliminate it, it does give me support and I feel better than when I didn't have it. Its not too soft that its not supportive but its not too hard either. The small of my back is quite short and very curved and this fits in their perfectly. My only issue with it is that the strap could be longer. I got it around my very average sized office chair but its completely maxxed out.
customer_reviews.author: Carina J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but does not fit car seat
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Light weight. Easy to move from seat to seat. Does not fit my car seat or provide needed lumbar support in the car (the reason for my purchase). It rested below my belt line, well below lumbar spine.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: It does not work. It is made up of ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. It is made up of very soft foam. There is no back support after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Diego MOLANO

customer_reviews.title: Support is fine but strap broke right away
customer_reviews.text: While first installing this in my car, the strap snapped in two and the flimsy plastic buckle/adjuster broke. It can still be used, but I was hoping NOT to have to adjust the pillow every time I get into the car. Understandably, the pillow slips out of place as you exit or enter the car. As to the pillow support, it works just fine for the lowest part of the back but since it is only 8" high, don't expect support to the mid-back. This will be a factor for your personal support needs, not necessarily a downside to the product. It does improve the seating in my 2001 Mercedes SLK230 roadster!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Quality product but wish it came with 2 straps
customer_reviews.text: Quality memory foam back cushion. Have used it about 6 weeks now and it is still quite supportive. Although the strap is of high quality if you plan on using it around your desk chair you'll soon wish it came with 2 straps like many other models. I ended up purchasing another model with 2 wider straps for my desk chair but use this one in my reclining reading chair and car seat without the straps and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: MWD

customer_reviews.title: Great Lumbar Support
customer_reviews.text: It seems that all the "comfortable" furniture in my living room becomes very uncomfortable after awhile because of lack of serious lumbar support. This little pillow hits my lower back in just the right area to give it support with the wedge shape and rounded corners making the design just about perfect. I have tried standard throw pillows behind my back but they come up a little too high, particularly in the corners, and become uncomfortable after while.
customer_reviews.author: Augy

customer_reviews.title: Great lower back support pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 partially herniated disks at L3/L4. I've used many pillows in my office chair for lower back support, but this one is the best so far. The combination of the firmness of the foam and the shape are perfect. Good value for the money, and worth every penny if you need lower back support.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Schnittman

customer_reviews.title: Large comfort in a small pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the RS1 pillow for my wife who suffers from sciatica and after just two days of use she is singing its praises. We even ordered another one so she can have one when she travels. Extremely comfortable, supportive, well-designed and durable construction makes this lumbar pillow a must-have for anyone who suffers from lower back pain while sitting at work, at home, or traveling by car or plane.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A Burgess

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, timely delivery. I was looking for lumbar support that was "just right" (like Baby Bear's porridge), and the Relax Support provided 90% of what I was looking for. (A bit more firm would have been perfect.) I place the support in my SUV seat just above the back pockets of my jeans, so that it supports L-5,4, and 3, my three herniated discs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these pillows, one of which I keep on my office chair and the other on my lounging chair. Not only are they comfortable, but my back actually feels better. I have a lumbar support in my Subaru, and these orthopedic pillows feel much the same against my back.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Best multipurpose back support!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow! Provides just the right amount of support whether sitting on a plane, in a car, or a recliner. Has saved my back numerous times when travelling to conferences, seminars, restaurants and concert venues. You never know what the seating will be and this provided the perfect amount of support and softness without collapsing. I am a larger woman and this pillow holds up well. I've also used it for a makeshift laptop pillow in a pinch at a recent symposium. Don't hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Speechie

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and it works well!
customer_reviews.text: This Is for my wife. The quality of the product does look promising. She will begin using it at work and I will report back. Reporting back- wife likes it so I ordered one. She took it and now uses it at home. I just ordered another one for me! One thing though. There is a 20% coupon card that came with it. The website to get the discount code does not exist. Better to offer nothing than to get anyone's hopes up for a discount.
customer_reviews.author: Marvelous

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable & Supportive
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pillow. It is comfortable and does seem to stay firm and supportive. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it slides around on my office chair. I tighten the buckle but it still doesn't stay in place. Not a big deal, I just readjust each time I sit down and would still highly recommend. My back feels well supported and is not sore at the end of the day. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my back and it really stays on the chair wherever you place it. It is hard enough to hold its shape, whilst beig very comfy. I took it on the plane and the car when I went on a road trip and it was a lifesaver. I have two herniated discs, so my lumbar area always hurts. This doesn't fix it, but it does help relieve some pain at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Gara

customer_reviews.title: Back relief at a low price.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from back trouble and until recently, my recliner has worked well. Now it seems to have worn in the back support area. I bought this pillow to support my lumbar area and it works beautifully to ease my back strain. I highly recommend it. The price was very reasonable and the shipping was speedy!
customer_reviews.author: Mantracker

customer_reviews.title: Very befitting lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: For over 15 years I used a meager lumber pillow I got from the Chinese supermarket for a few dollars. I need that support in the car seat to fill that space. Even when I got a rental I had to move the pillow to the rental car. This lumbar pillow fills right into the seat space and I have never been more comfortable. I am very happy I found this pillow. For years I was looking for a replacement but maybe I did not search properly to locate this item.
customer_reviews.author: JasminBoss

customer_reviews.title: This company stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the RS1 thinking it would be the perfect back support for me. It wasn't, it was to soft. I emailed the company and they replaced it with the RS5 which I love because I can choose the level of support I need. Great company to do business with. I would give the RS5 ***** (5 stars)
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: From Miserable To Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: This was the text I received from my husband after putting this RELAX SUPPORT pillow behind his back.. Aaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh😌 If you have back problems, this is the pillow for you! Be sure to read the directions and let the pillow sit out to warm up. This is day two, and it offers support ((He's sitting better in his chair) comfort and pain relief. I think this will actually be life changing. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: The Best Lumbar Support Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Great lumbar support! I have to sit for long periods of time which causes my back to ache. I'm so glad I found this jewel of pillow that has relived my back pain while sitting. I tried several others but this lumbar support pillow far surpassed them all in comfort and softness. I highly recommend this pillow. You won't regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TXBluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: Too Soft... Need much more firm for car
customer_reviews.text: Update: Company reached out to me & is refunding my money. They were really awesome to do That so I increased the stars. I Was hoping this would work for car but is far too soft. I liked the shape & is ok for my recliner but not the car
customer_reviews.author: JillyBear

customer_reviews.title: Works great for lumbar support while driving!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for a long drive across the country from TX to WI and was so happy to receive it right away! It helped me all the way on my long journey of a little over 24 hours of driving! I am enjoying it every time I drive now. It wraps around your seat and connects to stay in place. It was a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Robin L. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my work truck equipped with air seats. It helps my back stay stable when bouncing all over the road. It works well to support my lower lumbar after my surgery. I’ve had it for almost a year now and it still holds shape. One warning, don’t leave it in a vehicle overnight if it gets cold. The pillow turns into a rock and takes forever to “thaw” out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Provides Good Lumbar Support
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back due to compression fractures, and this product has provided me with good lumbar support. I keep a beige one in my car--it matches my leather seats. Because that one works so well, I ordered a gray one to use in my house and take it with me to use in movie theater seats and other places like doctors' offices and friends' cars. The beige and gray pillows were each ten dollars cheaper than the black pillow--don't know why, but I was glad to save the money!
customer_reviews.author: J.W.V.

customer_reviews.title: Too squishy
customer_reviews.text: This is a small squishy pillow that provides no real lumbar support. It's no different than putting a towel or something behind your back. I would have given it 2 stars for its purpose as a basic back pillow if it weren't for the price. It's a complete rip off at almost 30 dollars. It's worth 10 bucks at best. Don't buy this if you're looking for back pain relief or support. Just use a towel or try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Nick V

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with minor low and middle back pain for several weeks. I am physically fit and exercise at least 4times per week. I’m on the short side and have been shrinking with age. Thought I would try a little extra lumbar support to see if I couldn’t ease the discomfort. It has certainly helped so far. Pillow is not very big and can be moved to where ever you feel you are in need of extra support. Hope the relief is enough to allow my back strain to heal soon.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Love it everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is great sitting in bed sitting in the car sitting on the couch sitting in the chair!
customer_reviews.author: Mishka

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use but not for airplane use
customer_reviews.text: First of all I should have ordered a dark color. I purchased the natural and it shows everything. This support is good for a car ride or a hard back chair. It’s a bit to stiff for an airplane. I’m 5’4 and 145lbs and it hits the right place but really pushes me forward in an airplane seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sneiderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my back
customer_reviews.text: Each person's need for back support are different and this item fit the boll for me. I ordered one and it worked so well I ordered another one for another room. Since I have difficulty moving fro one room to another, it helps not to have to carry my back support. I suggest that each person try several different designs to find one that works best. I had two others before finding this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ramil C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: is nice looking, and comes with a case
customer_reviews.text: This is made well, is nice looking, and comes with a case. I wish directions came with it regarding where to place it. It's good in an office chair. I've been trying it in the car, in a theatre, at a meeting, etc. It's not too comfortable when I sit on the couch. I hope it will be good on an airplane. I'm getting used to it. Sometimes I have neck pain if I use it too high on my back.
customer_reviews.author: PPO3

customer_reviews.title: Great back support
customer_reviews.text: Great support, for people with back problems, the only downside was the belt attached to it coz it slides and loses its hold to one end from time to time so y have to reconnect and insert the belt again in the plastic hook that doesn’t have a clasp to close it ( which they should have)to have the foam in its proper place on the chair’s back rest
customer_reviews.author: MARIAN

customer_reviews.title: If you got a lower back pain .... buy it....
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it this week and used it for 3 hours in May car. It help all the time I used it and I had to buy it after my sore lower back It was soft and help The lower back and lumbar area.... Didn’t have sore lumbar after the amount of hours driving The recommendation is to make the belt a little wider to fit the car or truck seat, the clip was loose and had to stop using the belt Also it can be a bit thicker as I feel that after the amount of hours the pillow was getting soft and thinner Overall I recommend to use it.... I hope also works well during a flight....
customer_reviews.author: Love shopping online

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry , lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a pain in the lumbar area and I bought several products from Amazon This particular one was for the car but I ended up using it for The tv area Dinning room It’s portable and light and easy to carry The only reason I don’t give them a 5 stars is that - for me- is a bit small ... a bit taller would’ve been great
customer_reviews.author: Linda Roude

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow to carry around
customer_reviews.text: I once tried this pillow when I bumped into a colleague on a southwest flight going to Houston. He had a relax support pillow and I tried it. It felt good when I leaned on it. Hence, I ordered one myself. However, when I got mine, it came defective, It came with a minor tear of about 1 mm near one of the seams. I had to go through the trouble of calling in amazon in order to get a return started, now I have to go to drop it off at ups, I had to reorder again another one in hope of this time not getting a defective item. It has been a first time order inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time . Returning this as unfortunately not a good product . Put my spine out of integrity regardless of where I put it . My intention was to find a great product for my clients while driving
customer_reviews.author: Ann-kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great lower back support
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great for lower back support in my 2019 Honda Civic. I love my car, but the seats are terrible and very uncomfortable with zero lumbar support. This pillow, especially once worn in a little bit is perfect to fill that spot and give me low back support without making me feel like my mid to upper back are suspended in air. i can still sit back all the way.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pillow!! I bought it for lower back pain and in the one day I’ve had it, I’m already so happy with it that I rushed to write this review...and that’s not typical for me! I’ve used it while sitting on a chair watching tv, sitting on the floor, driving in my car and now while sitting at my desk at work and it is so comfortable and giving me so much comfort!! I’d highly recommend this pillow to anyone! It’s also super light so it’s very easy to carry around with you!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Back Support!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a back support that would concentrate on the small of my back. This fit the bill perfectly. The straps are fully adjustable to almost any chair & allow me to slide the pillow to the exact comfortable spot. The pillow is firm yet soft enough to provide perfect pain/strain relief and support. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JSM

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this one day and I can already tell a difference! I set it up on my chair at work and immediately had to adjust my monitor heights to higher because I was sitting up straighter! I bought it to help keep my heating pad in place for a sore/injured back/side. OMGosh! I had no idea! I didn't even have to turn on my heating pad until much later in the day. When I finally did turn it on, it did what I thought it would, and help better hold it in place. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: franky jun

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW !!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this sensational little pillow !!! Since I started working from home even with my LAZY BOY chair I STILL need the LUMBAR SUPPORT. Not moving around like I was in the office this pillow has SAVED my lower back from hours of sitting!! PERFECT !!!
customer_reviews.author: G55

customer_reviews.title: It has helped while driving!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is of good quality with a comfortable memory foam cushion. It seems to be a bit short but if I move it up my back a little in the seat it is fine. Overall it is comfortable and seems to be helping my lower back pain in the few days I have been using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Supports the back in a car
customer_reviews.text: I have a herniated disc of my L4-5 of the lower back and have a Honda Civic sport so the seats are not comfortable for my back. But this helps with how my seat arches right by the lower back and this replaces that space that I needed. It’s a tad uncomfortable because I think it’s a little too thick but that’s my only complaint to give.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Loved it right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box, put it on my chair and IMMEDIATE low back pain relief. I may need one more to keep in my car! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Strap Keeps Coming Unhooked
customer_reviews.text: I do believe this product is helping me sit straighter and more comfortably at my desk (which I sit at all day for my job) but at least 3 times a day, the adjustable strap will become unhooked, which is really annoying. I'm also not sure the elastic is going to hold out over a long period of time. I used the support in my car on a long road trip and it seemed to help there also(did not use the strap in the car - not sure it would fit around the car seat). October 2019 update - the strap is becoming unhooked more and more often - not sure I'd recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: warm and fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: If you are a busy person, that's always sitting down like me studying or doing other things in a computer table, this is for you. This pillow has really helped me with lower back discomfort from sitting down all-day. I love how easy it is to carry it around, I use it in my car and my computer chair and even when I am sitting in my bed sometimes. Love this and how much it has helped my lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Dani S

customer_reviews.title: Great for recliners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nana to use on her favorite recliner that became uncomfortable for her back. It provided instant relief! The pillow filled the gap in the back of the chair, which was the issue. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Danae

customer_reviews.title: Its everything it claims to be
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using it a short time, but I love how comfortable and versatile it is. Its well worth the money, so far. As time goes on I'll update this review with anything I find noteworthy about it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It really helps!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I found something that really helps my lower back. I have had issues with my lower back due to my job having to sit 8 hours a day in front of a computer. The relax support pillow has done wonders easing the pain and discomfort. I have tried just about everything and this really works! I recommend this without a doubt to be the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Terrible brand name, Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: "Relax Support" is a very uninspired brand name and i hate that it is stitched into the pillow.. that being said, this pillow is great and cant find very many that are like this. Fits exactly what i need when im driving. I was forced to buy this despite the awful name. But again, because this seems one of a kind on amazon, i wasn't left with very many options..
customer_reviews.author: scott hwee

customer_reviews.title: Good back support while driving
customer_reviews.text: This pillow provides great support and pain relief. The only thing I don't like about it is the starp that attaches the pillow to the seat. It just fits over the driver seat and has no buckles, only loops that slip oner a plastic piece. This makes it less sturdy than a strap with buckles. It pops out frequently. I recommend it for the support but give it 3 stars because of the strap construction
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Also, it has the perfect density-not to hard (uncomfortable) but not to soft (mushy). The density is firm giving great support, but gives "just" enough for comfort. I'd like to see if they have a seat cushion made with the same material.
customer_reviews.author: Chococat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lumbar Pillow
customer_reviews.text: The lumbar pillow arrived promptly and I began using it right away. It's the perfect size, comfortable with good support. I use it when I'm sitting on the couch and it helps keeping me in a good seating position. This is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Stop scrolling and buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: I've dealt with lower back/QL stiffness and pain for years after starting a desk job and could never find any relief. I have a convertible sit/stand workstation but even with periodic standing I was still struggling when I eventually did need to sit. I recently started using this pillow and it has changed. the. game. The memory foam is firm but supportive and doesn't shove you off the front of your chair like some back pillows. I wish I had this years ago. 10/10. I'm definitely buying one for my car as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my lower back/Sciatica pain
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from Sciatica pain for couple years now and tried many different products to 'fix' my posture while sitting which, according to my Therapist, caused the inflammation and pain. I found this product to be extremely useful, particularly due to 'easy to carry' feature, I take it with me where ever I go, e,g, in plane or in long drive. As a matter of fact, I just bought an extra one so I can leave one at home, and one for work. Thinking to buy a third one for my car :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great support
customer_reviews.text: It can be really hard to find a back pillow that's not too thick, not too thin, not too, not too small, but just right! This one does the trick. I'm using it in my recliner, and it's easy to position and gives my back the perfect support. Very happy (and so is my back)!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: OK product, just not for me
customer_reviews.text: I think the lumbar pillow would work for most people, however it's not a good fit for me, hence the 3 stars. I am a larger than most person & the pillow did not hit the spot. Also, fabric is very rough and has an odour to my senses. The packaging was great though and I can see potential value overall. The company has great follow-up protocol and customer service. Hopefully this product will help many others .
customer_reviews.author: Kamee

customer_reviews.title: Just got the product. It's great
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist told me that I should only sit in a lounge chair if I had a lumbar pillow in it. I got one then decided I needed another one for a rocking chair I have in my bedroom. They really help in both chairs. I plan to take one on a plane ride when I'm going to Virginia to see my daughter. I think it will make the plane ride a lot more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Neena

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Been having a lot of lower back pain lately sitting on the couch binging hours of "must see" TV. This back support pillow has made a big difference. Now I'm good to go for hours on end. All I need now is something to take care of the annoying bathroom breaks!
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: nice cute lumbar pillow
customer_reviews.text: right size for what i wanted in lumbar pillow, comes with one strap that goes around my chair. I had to return a different lumbar pillow that was bigger but straps were too long. This is small enough to be portable and fits perfectly to cushion my low back area where I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't provide enough lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't provide lumbar support. I tried putting a rolled up towel between the pillow and chair back, but it's still not supportive enough. The photo shows the pillow behind the butt area and not the small of your back. Not sure who needs support down that far, but it's not for the back.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Tricky placement
customer_reviews.text: Either I'm not placing the cushion correctly against my back, or it's not meant for my car seat, because I have a hard time finding a comfortable position for it. I find myself protruding out from the car seat too much. I try to align the cushion with the curve of my lower back, but I find I'm sliding too much against it. I might look for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Smallish, but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A bit small in size and I can't strap it around my living room chair to keep it in place. But, if I put it in place as I lean back, it fits my back perfectly. May use it in my car. I'll see if that's another option.
customer_reviews.author: carpenter

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is perfect in every way - just the right size, very soft and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is just the right size - not too big and bulky like many lumbar pillows. And the memory foam is very comfortable and soft. The overall construction is of high quality. I especially like that there is a zipper to allow you to remove the cover and wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon and Vera Steury

customer_reviews.title: Helps with lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of lower back pain and I have tried a lot of different kinds of pillows to put in my chairs when I sit, well, I have finally found one that works. This pillow fills in that space between your lower back and the chair and gives your the support you need.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my mother for airplane travel. She said it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bookhappy

customer_reviews.title: Next trip I took was comfortable the entire way
customer_reviews.text: Went on a three hour road trip with a new car. About halfway into it my low back was uncomfortable. Realized I didn’t have as much lumbar support as I did in a previous vehicle. I purchased this lumbar pillow with memory foam and that solved my low back pain. Next trip I took was comfortable the entire way. Only complaint is the strap to secure it to the back of the car seat isn’t long enough to go around the seat. Oh well. I use it all the time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D

customer_reviews.title: Back Support
customer_reviews.text: I recently developed lower back pain. I purchased this lumbar support pillow to support my back when sitting in a chair or on my couch. The difficulty I found with the pillow is that it doesn't stay in place when attached to my dining room chair. The strap appears to loosen over time and slide down, making it necessary to readjust it. The pillow itself is fine; I just wish that it would stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette A. Balk

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something ease or erase your back pain, look no further. This piece even fits perfectly on a bar stool (with a back) type chair. Since I started using it, I don't remember once, complaining about back pain.. Thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ceren P

customer_reviews.title: A pillow that makes sitting more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this pillow helps my back relax. It hits me right where I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Dot  M

customer_reviews.title: Back cushion
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, but it was for me uncomfortable on my lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was comfortable and felt great on my back. The problem is it does not stay in place for the position I need it in on my office chair. It attaches much like a fanny pack with an elastic band that goes around the back of the chair. However,It slides down to the bottom part of my chair and does not stay in the lumbar part of my back where I need it. I have tried to work with it for several days adjusting it multiple times, however continues to be an issue. I will be returning it unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Terri Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great quality products and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a great pillow, unfortunately it didn't fit my unusual condition. But i highly recommend it and am amazed at how much relax support cares for their customers! Not only did they email me to see how i like it, they refunded my money without a problem. Also the pillow only took 3 days to get to me, when i was told it should be 8 days! Great customer service, great quality products, and easy to contact!👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Lennon

customer_reviews.title: Not does what it claims!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is certainly not worth the price! It's just a piece of foam in a kidney shape. It does not give much support. I used it on a flight and because of the material in the pillow, my low back got very hot and uncomfortable. I had to throw it away upon arrival at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Jianying Gan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Soft. Small and easy to move one seat to another. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! This arrived a day after I ordered it. It is soft to the touch so forms nicely to my back and adds support where needed. It's easily adjustable while sitting in the car. I am able to raise it slightly higher for lumbar support or lower if needed. It is also smaller than some other brands and I like that I didnt have to change my car seat position.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Studley

customer_reviews.title: Support cushion
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend, I drive a Toyota Highlander and the elastic is not long enough to stay closed Anne comes undone when I am driving.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: SOLID SUPPORT WHERE IT IS MOST NEEDED!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried many pillows for my lower back pain and this has proven to be the best. Support where you need it most. Also, it is not bulky, is easy to transport and remains in place. Have just purchased a second one. Will purchase a third soon for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Cat.

product_meta.title: RS1 Back Support Pillow by RelaxSupport – Lumbar Pillow Upper and Lower Back for Chair Back Pain Uses ArcContour Special Patented Technology Has Unique Lateral Convex Shape for a Pain Free Back
feature_bullets: ✅ CUSTOMERS SAY OUR BACK SUPPORT PILLOW is the one to choose because it “…FITS THE LOWER BACK IN JUST THE RIGHT AREA..”, “…PROVIDES JUST ENOUGH LUMBAR SUPPORT WITHOUT BEING BULKY…” and “…IS VERY WELL MADE AND SOFT TO THE TOUCH…”.

✅FOUNDATIONALLY FIRM YET SOFT AS A CLOUD: IF YOU’VE DONE YOUR RESEARCH, you already know that most back support pillows are either hard as a brick or so soft that they “melt away” into nothing. The RS1 RELAXSUPPORT PILLOW does neither and we have GONE THE EXTRA MILE TO GIVE YOU the support you need by offering you the CHOICE OF TWO FIRMNESSES so you can decide the best support for your needs.

✅ THE BEST LUMBAR PILLOW – IDEAL FOR TRAVEL, AT THE OFFICE, PREGNANCY, WHEELCHAIRS, COMMUTES AND MORE: The RS1 LUMBAR PILLOW is manufactured from the HIGHEST QUALITY MEMORY FOAM from the best memory foam manufactures IN THE WORLD. The pillow cover is made from breathable cotton that not only wicks away moisture to KEEP YOU COOL, it is also REMOVABLE and MACHINE WASHABLE.

✅ THE ONLY LUMBAR PILLOW with REVOLUTIONARY TWO-SIDES STEADFASTGRIP STRAP TECHNOLOGY: NOW WITH AN EVEN WIDER STRAP IT KEEPS YOUR BACK PILLOW IN PLACE to give you the support you need without the constant need to re-adjust. The ADJUSTABLE STRAPS also allow it to fit anywhere, anytime.

✅ YOUR NEW FAVORITE LOWER BACK PILLOW OR YOUR MONEY BACK! While most lumber pillows go flat over time or get lumpy and need “fluffing up”, our memory foam back pillow lasts and lasts and lasts. If you at ANY TIME decide our pillow is not right for you, CONTACT US FOR A 100% REFUND GUARANTEED NO QUESTIONS ASKED!
